Summary: Two to Three lights diving and ascending into the air around eachother at breakneck speeds.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile heading to car, noticed these lights in the distance, playing a sort or tag, hovering near eachother, then speeding away. Getting close then again speeding from eachother. Went and got a friend to see what I was, and then went and got two more friends. All of us witnessed the lights speeding towards, then away from eachother at high speeds, and changing directions without stopoping or slowing down.
